secrets_store.main.page.title: Secrets Store
secrets_store.main.page.permission_warni: There is no default Secrets Store linked to this account yet, and you do not have permission to create one. Please contact your account administrator to grant your user permissions to create resources within the Secrets Store.

You do not have permission to access the Secrets Store in this account. Please contact your account administrator, and ask to grant your user permissions to read/list resources within the Secrets Store.
Secrets Store is not enabled on this account.
secrets_store.main.page.description: Encrypt and store sensitive information as secrets that are securely reusable across an account.
secrets_store.list.table.header.name: Name
secrets_store.list.table.status_tooltip: Indicates if a secret is available for deployment at Cloudflare's edge
secrets_store.list.table.empty.title: Securely use secrets across Cloudflare
secrets_store.list.table.empty.descripti: Secrets Store allows you to store and manage secrets which can be used by resources across an account. Use role-based access control (RBAC) to authorize which users on this account can upload, edit, or remove secrets.
Create your first account-level secret by pressing the u2018Create secretu2019 button above.
secrets_store.list.table.empty.cta.label: Create secret
Are you sure you want to delete %{smart_count} secret? The following service(s) will be affected: |||| Are you sure you want to delete %{smart_count} secrets? The following service(s) will be affected:
There was an error deleting the selected %{smart_count} secret. Please try again. |||| There was an error deleting the selected %{smart_count} secrets. Please try again.
Successfully deleted %{smart_count} secret. |||| Successfully deleted %{smart_count} secrets.
secrets_store.list.side_modal.title: View secret
secrets_store.list.side_modal.subtitle: View the configurations for your secret.
secrets_store.usage_and_quota: You have used %{usage} out of %{quota} secrets
secrets_store.delete.modal.title: Delete secret
secrets_store.delete.modal.description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete %{secretName}? The following service(s) will be affected:
secrets_store.form.name_subtitle: Unique name to identify the secret, no spaces. Once saved this cannot be changed.
secrets_store.form.scopes_subtitle: Specify which resources can read this secret.
secrets_store.form.value_subtitle: The contents of this secret. Once saved, the secret value will be encrypted and no longer available for viewing.
secrets_store.form.value_subtitle_edit: The contents of this secret. The current secret's value is encrypted and no longer available for viewing.
secrets_store.form.click_to_edit: Value encrypted. Click to set a new value.
secrets_store.form.comment_subtitle: Add descriptive text for this secret.
secrets_store.form.tags_subtitle: Add tags to this secret to help you identify it.
secrets_store.form.create.success: Successfully created %{smart_count} secret. |||| Successfully created %{smart_count} secrets
secrets_store.form.create.error: There was an error creating %{smart_count} secret. Please try again. |||| There was an error creating %{smart_count} secrets. Please try again
secrets_store.form.create.errors.name.in: Only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and dashes are allowed
secrets_store.form.create.errors.duplica: The following secret name already exists: %{name}
secrets_store.form.edit.error: There was an error updating the secret. Please try again
secrets_store.form.duplicate.error: There was an error duplicating the secret. Please try again

secrets_store.form.quota_reached.outside: Impossible to add %{smart_count} secret. %{usage} out of %{quota} secrets are currently used. secrets_store.form.quota_reached.duplica: Impossible to duplicate secret. %{usage} out of %{quota} secrets are currently used.
